duties_responsibilities.duty: Constantly up-to-date regarding market trends and knows and monitors competition.
Manages sales and optimizes each step of the sales process.
Captures customer data into the company’s CRM tool with the purpose of connecting to the client, maintaining and developing the relationship offering a personalized approach.
Takes part in all in-store product presentations and has an in-depth knowledge of all the products in the assigned product range.
Constantly maintains product display in perfect conditions according to the company’s guidelines and points out any necessary correction to increase sales.
Knows available products in stock in order to maximize sales and helps in receiving stock and in maintaining the stockroom according to standards at all times.
Keeps the assigned position in order to prevent thefts, cooperating with colleagues if needed.
